name: Apiens
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.
The smart-contract owner can mint new tokens, please proceed with caution.

description.en:
What is the project about?
Apiens is a fashion-oriented NFT community that began in January 2022. Since then, we have been working on developing this community and collaborating with a clothing brand to create a clothing line.


What makes your project unique?
We are a community that focuses on fashion and utilizes NFTs. Our main objective is to create clothing items that are integrated with blockchain technology and make them accessible to a larger audience.

History of your project.

Apiens began in January 2022 with the goal of creating a fashion-oriented community. Since then, it has formed partnerships with several brands, including exclusible.com, sneakmart.com, virtua metaverse, instrinctfirst.com, and cult&rain, among others. Through these collaborations, Apiens has developed new product lines and worked to establish its brand presence.

What’s next for your project?
We are branching out to build IRL business and bring as many collaboration as possible. At the same time we will be building a tight-knit community in web3.

What can your token be used for?
$APN will serve as the primary token for our ecosystem. It will be utilised for conducting transactions within our ecosystem and rewarding individuals who hold it.

What is the project about?
Apiens is a fashion-oriented NFT community that began in January 2022. Since then, we have been working on developing this community and collaborating with a clothing brand to create a clothing line.


What makes your project unique?
We are a community that focuses on fashion and utilizes NFTs. Our main objective is to create clothing items that are integrated with blockchain technology and make them accessible to a larger audience.

History of your project.

Apiens began in January 2022 with the goal of creating a fashion-oriented community. Since then, it has formed partnerships with several brands, including exclusible.com, sneakmart.com, virtua metaverse, instrinctfirst.com, and cult&rain, among others. Through these collaborations, Apiens has developed new product lines and worked to establish its brand presence.

What’s next for your project?
We are branching out to build IRL business and bring as many collaboration as possible. At the same time we will be building a tight-knit community in web3.

What can your token be used for?
$APN will serve as the primary token for our ecosystem. It will be utilised for conducting transactions within our ecosystem and rewarding individuals who hold it.
